title: Redirect unauthenticated user to login
description: Verify that a user who is not authenticated is redirected to the /login page upon accessing the application.

steps.description: Open the application homepage while not authenticated
Check that the user is redirected to /login

title: Successful login with Supabase authentication
description: Check that a valid user can login successfully using Supabase authentication and gain access to the application dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the /login page
Enter valid credentials and submit the login form
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the Dashboard page

title: Create new client without linked process
description: Verify that the user can create a client without linking a process, and the client appears correctly in the client list.

steps.description: Navigate to the Clients module
Click the 'New Client' button
Fill client details without linking any process
Click 'Save'
Verify client is created and listed correctly with no linked processes

title: Create new client with linked process
description: Validate that creating a new client linked to an existing process succeeds and is reflected in both client and process listings.

steps.description: Ensure at least one process exists
Navigate to the Clients module
Click 'New Client' button
Fill client details and select an existing process to link
Click 'Save'
Confirm client is created with process linked, visible in both client and process views

title: Fail to create process without linked client
description: Check that users cannot create a process without linking an existing client, and appropriate validation message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the Processes module
Click 'New Process' button
Fill process details but leave client linkage empty
Attempt to save the process
Validate that an error is shown indicating client linkage is mandatory

title: Validate process number format
description: Verify that the process number input enforces correct format validation and rejects invalid formats.

steps.description: Navigate to Processes module and start creating a new process
Fill process number with invalid format (e.g., empty, letters, wrong pattern)
Attempt to save the process
Check that validation prevents saving and shows a relevant error message

title: Create event in agenda linked to client and process
description: Check creation of an agenda event linked to both client and process, and its visibility in calendar and list views.

steps.description: Access the Schedule module
Click 'New Event'
Enter event details and link to an existing client and process
Save the event
Verify the event is displayed in calendar and agenda list with correct linkages

title: Manage deadlines linked to processes
description: Verify that users can create, view, edit, and delete deadlines linked to processes, and that lists update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to deadlines or processes deadlines list
Add a new deadline linked to a process
Verify deadline appears correctly in the list
Edit the deadline details
Confirm updates are saved and reflected in UI
Delete the deadline
Verify the deadline no longer appears

title: Add financial entry linked to client and process
description: Validate creation of financial entries (income and expense) linked to clients and processes accepting simple currency format values.

steps.description: Go to the Finance module
Click 'New Entry'
Complete form with entry type (income/expense), client, process, and valid amount
Save the financial entry
Confirm the entry is saved and listed linked to the correct client and process

title: Reject financial entry with invalid amount format
description: Ensure that financial entries with malformed or invalid amount formats are rejected and trigger validation messages.

steps.description: Attempt to add a financial entry with non-numeric or malformed amount
Submit the entry form
Check for validation error preventing save and displaying appropriate message

title: Generate reports with filters without errors
description: Verify reports can be generated with various filter combinations and data loads correctly without errors or delays.

steps.description: Navigate to the Reports module
Apply different filter sets (date ranges, clients, process status, financial entry types)
Generate report
Confirm the report loads correctly without errors or timeouts and displays expected filtered data

title: Team member CRUD operations
description: Check create, read, update and delete operations on team members work correctly, including listings and confirmation dialogs.

steps.description: Navigate to Team module
Create a new team member with required information
Verify new member appears in the list
Edit the member's details and save
Confirm changes are reflected in the member list
Delete the member and confirm the deletion
Verify the member is removed from the list

title: Persist settings changes after reload
description: Validate that changes made in the application settings are saved and persist after reloading the application.

steps.description: Go to the Settings module
Modify several settings values
Save the configuration
Reload the application page
Confirm that the saved settings values persist after reload

title: Dashboard widgets load and display data without errors
description: Check all dashboard widgets and summaries load successfully displaying accurate data and without UI errors or timeouts.

steps.description: Login and navigate to Dashboard
Verify all widgets display relevant data and no errors or loading issues appear

title: Bidirectional link between client and process
description: Ensure linking a process to a client updates both client and process views, and vice versa, maintaining consistency.

steps.description: Create or select a client
Create a process linked to that client
Verify client details reflect the new process linkage
From the process view, check client data and confirm linkage
Confirm consistency and bidirectional linkage is correct

title: Buttons respond correctly for all modules
description: Verify that all buttons such as New, Save, Cancel, Edit, Delete (with confirmation), and Back function as expected across all modules.

steps.description: Within each module, test the New button initiates correct form or view
Fill forms and verify Save commits changes properly
Use Cancel to discard changes and check navigation or reset
Test Edit buttons open editing mode correctly
Click Delete and confirm dialog appears, and confirm removal on acceptance
Check Back button returns to the expected previous screen
Ensure no unexpected errors occur when clicking these buttons

title: Data persists correctly after application reload
description: Validate that data created or updated in clients, processes, agenda, financial entries, and team members persist correctly after a full page reload.

steps.description: Create or update data in various modules (clients, processes, agenda, finance, team)
Reload the entire application page
Verify all data changes are retained and displayed accurately in their respective modules
